text: Kalari is a 1991 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Prassi Malloor, starring Siddique and Rizabawa in the lead roles. The film was a flop. ==Cast== * Innocent * Thikkurissi Sukumaran Nair * Siddique (actor) * Unnimary * Bobby Kottarakkara * Jagadish * Kuthiravattam Pappu * Mala Aravindan * Nagesh * Philomina * Risabava * Uthara ==Trivia== The film has a song Neeharam pozhiyarai.. with clips of Mohanlal taken from Malayalam film Thalavattam. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Kalari (1991 film)
